import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-projects', templateUrl: './projects.component.html', styleUrls: ['./projects.component.css'] }) export class ProjectsComponent { featuredProject = { name: "Dynamic HRMS Management System", description: `A next-generation HRMS built for enterprise automation â€” integrating attendance, payroll, leave, and performance management. It features real-time synchronization across HR and payroll modules, advanced analytics dashboards, and dynamic leave policy logic. Built with Angular, PHP, and MySQL for high performance and scalability.`, techStack: ["Angular", "PHP", "MySQL", "CodeIgniter"], image: "assets/projects/hrms.jpg", link: "#" }; projects = [ { name: "UbiCRM â€” Customer Relationship Management", description: `A modern CRM platform designed to streamline sales pipelines, automate lead tracking, and visualize performance using dynamic charts and data analytics.`, techStack: ["Angular 17", "AdonisJS", "MySQL", "Highcharts.js"], image: "assets/projects/crm.jpg", link: "#" }, { name: "Organization Management System", description: `Developed a modular platform for onboarding, subscriptions, and multi-department workflows serving 3000+ organizations, enhancing productivity by 30%.`, techStack: ["AngularJS", "PHP (CodeIgniter)", "MySQL"], image: "assets/projects/organization.jpg", link: "#" }, { name: "Payroll Penalty Automation System", description: `Designed a flexible rule-based payroll deduction engine integrated with attendance logs, enabling 70% reduction in manual HR adjustments.`, techStack: ["Angular", "PHP", "MySQL"], image: "assets/projects/payroll.jpg", link: "#" }, { name: "Automatic Email & Notification System", description: `Built an automated notification engine for reminders, alerts, and HR communications â€” ensuring faster, smarter internal updates.`, techStack: ["Angular", "PHP", "MySQL"], image: "assets/projects/notifications.jpg", link: "#" } ]; }
